meanings.sent1: The teacher was a respected figure in the school community.
meanings.sent2: She is a respected scientist in her field.
meanings.sent3: The respected chef accidentally added salt instead of sugar to the cake.
meanings.sent4: His respected leadership guided the team to victory.
meanings.sent5: The respected author's words inspired many readers.

meanings.sent1: The respected elder shared wisdom with the younger generation.
meanings.sent2: The soldier was respected for their bravery in battle.
meanings.sent3: The respected judge wore mismatched socks to court by mistake.
meanings.sent4: Her respected position in the company earned her a promotion.
meanings.sent5: The respected artist's work was displayed in prestigious galleries.

meanings.definition: Considered to be of high regard
meanings.sent1: The respected doctor always put patients' needs first.
meanings.sent2: He is a respected member of the community for his charitable work.
meanings.sent3: The respected musician played the wrong note during the concert.
meanings.sent4: Her respected reputation opened doors to new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The respected athlete broke records with their exceptional skills.
